Package com.gwt.ss.client

Interface Summary
GwtLogin <form-login> for Gwt, instantiate a GwtUsernamePasswordAuthority is needed.
GwtLoginAsync  
GwtLogout <logout> direct from GWT RPC,you need instantiate a GwtLogoutSuccessHandler and assign to <logout success-handler-ref="hander-reference"/>
This interface did not annotated with @RemoteServiceRelativePath, Do not generate instance by GWT.create, Just invoke GwtLogoutAsync.Util.getInstance instead.
GwtLogoutAsync  
 

Class Summary
GwtLoginAsync.Util Maintain singleton GwtLoginAsync instance.
GwtLogoutAsync.Util Maintain singleton GwtLogoutAsync instance.
